metadata.title: CVE-2016-9851 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in phpMyAdmin. With a crafted request parametervalue it is possible to bypass the logout timeout. All 4.6.x versions(prior to 4.6.5), and 4.4.x versions (prior to 4.4.15.9) are affected.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in trusty is affected and needs fixing.
